templates.name: Test Frontend Developer Template
templates.description: A template for frontend developer positions
templates.title: Frontend Developer
templates.summary: We are seeking a skilled Frontend Developer to join our team.
templates.job_description: As a Frontend Developer, you will be responsible for creating user-friendly web interfaces using modern technologies like React, Vue.js, or Angular.
templates.requirements:
• 2+ years of experience with JavaScript
• Proficiency in React or Vue.js
• Knowledge of HTML5, CSS3
• Experience with responsive design
templates.preferred_skills:
• Experience with TypeScript
• Knowledge of testing frameworks
• Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines
